description.speaker: story
description.text: You're standing in an empty room. At least it seems to be empty, although actually there are some paintings, hanging on and some tables standing against the walls. The tables however are empty. maybe this give you the impression of emptiness.

description.speaker: story
description.text: Another empty room. Only that it's not quite empty. It seems to be something like a reading room with a lot of books standing in piles against the walls. Maybe this time it's the books giving you the feeling of emptiness...

description.speaker: indent
description.text: Books always make you feel empty.

description.speaker: TUTORIAL MASTER
description.text: You're in the first test-room with nothing in it whatsoever!

description.speaker: story
description.text: You are standing in a fairly dark tunnel. The walls seem to be of bear rock. This time it is not only a feeling of emptiness.

description.speaker: indent
description.text: It as actual cold, dull emptiness and pure devastating darkness

description.speaker: story
description.text: This is it, no the darkness has become darker and the emptiness has become emptier. There is only quit sound surrounding you.
